title: Bonus in September (SABESP - Companhia de Saneamento Básico do Estado de São Paulo)
text: ( Source : SABESP - Companhia de Saneamento Básico do Estado de São Paulo ) The population adhesion to the Bonus Program in the Greater São Paulo has gone up again in September. The Company 's data show that 81% of consumers reduced their
